text: The University of Limerick was set up in 1989. It is about 3 miles along the River Shannon from the centre of Limerick on a large wooded site. In 2023, there were 17,500 students and about 1,800 staff. It was voted Irelandâ€™s most popular university with a satisfaction rating of 85%. ==References== Category:Limerick Limerick
title: University of Limerick
